channel.title: An Express Blogger Site
channel.description: Blog in node.js with express in minutes - without a database

item.title: Your First Post Here
item.description:
This is your first post!

I wrote it for you so you can learn a bit about markdown and how to use it.

You can make lists

  • Like this
  • this
  • or this and this
function () {
  create.apply(['snippets','like','a','pro', true])
};
// (like a real pro)
var coolness = ['you','and','all','your','friends'];

item.title: An Older Post
item.description: This is another category - go ahead and change the categories. Express blogger is dynamic and will simply group together posts with the same category and provide navigation to a page where all posts from a category are shown.
